instructions.reason_for_call: You want to change your LA order to your NYC address (you prefer not to reveal it but it is in your other order). You also want to exchange Bluetooth Speaker to be the cheapest green type. Make sure you mention the two requests at the same time to the agent, but mention the exchange first.
instructions.known_info: You name is Yusuf Li and your zip code is 91148.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I have an order that was supposed to be delivered to Los Angeles, but I would like to change the delivery address to New York City. Also, I want to exchange the Bluetooth speaker in my order for the cheapest green type available. Can you help me with these two requests?

message.content: Hello! I have an order that was supposed to be delivered to Los Angeles, but I would like to change the delivery address to New York City. Also, I want to exchange the Bluetooth speaker in my order for the cheapest green type available. Can you help me with these two requests?

messages.content:
{
  "message": "I can help with both requests, but I need to identify your account first. Please provide one of the following to locate your account: 1) the email on file, or 2) your full name and ZIP code. Once I have access to your account, please provide:

1) Address change request:
- The order ID for the order with the delivery to Los Angeles (e.g., #W0000000)
- The new full address (address1, address2, city, state, country, zip)

2) Exchange request for the Bluetooth speaker:
- The order ID containing the Bluetooth speaker (e.g., #W0000000)
- The item ID of the Bluetooth speaker you want to exchange (one per item if multiple)
- The item IDs you want to receive in exchange (must match the same product type; for each new item, provide the corresponding item ID)
- The payment method to cover any price difference (e.g., gift_card_123 or credit_card_456)

Important: I will need explicit confirmation (yes) from you before I place any changes or a delivery address update, and before initiating an exchange. Please also note that address changes can only apply to pending orders, and exchanges apply to delivered orders (and can be done only once per order)."
}

I can provide you with my full name and ZIP code to locate my account. My name is Yusuf Li, and my ZIP code is 91148. 

For the address change, I don't have the order ID handy, but the order is the one with delivery to Los Angeles. I want to change the delivery address to my New York City address, but I prefer not to reveal the full address here. 

For the Bluetooth speaker exchange, I also don't have the order ID or item IDs. Could you please help me find this information based on my account details?
